phases.title: Enhanced reasoning modules integration
phases.description: Integration of advanced reasoning modules to improve the quality and depth of advice.

phases.title: Microservices architecture transition
phases.description: Transition from monolithic to microservices architecture to improve scalability and flexibility.
features: Splitting the backend into independent services

phases.title: Plugin system launch
phases.description: Launching a plugin system to extend Advisor AGI functionality for third-party developers.

phases.title: Multi-model AI integration
phases.description: Integrating various AI models to leverage their strengths in different areas.
features: Support for multiple base AI models
Mechanisms for selecting the optimal model for a task
Comparison and evaluation of model performance

phases.title: Autonomous learning capabilities
phases.description: Developing autonomous learning and self-improvement capabilities for the system.
features: Improving advice quality based on experience
